Resolve

Add instructions on how to resolve axis, legend, or scale in cases of composite plots

vl_resolve_axis_x() vl_resolve_axis_y() vl_resolve_legend_angle() vl_resolve_legend_color() vl_resolve_legend_fill() vl_resolve_legend_fillOpacity() vl_resolve_legend_opacity() vl_resolve_legend_radius() vl_resolve_legend_shape() vl_resolve_legend_size() vl_resolve_legend_stroke() vl_resolve_legend_strokeDash() vl_resolve_legend_strokeOpacity() vl_resolve_legend_strokeWidth() vl_resolve_legend_theta() vl_resolve_legend_x() vl_resolve_legend_y() vl_resolve_scale_angle() vl_resolve_scale_color() vl_resolve_scale_fill() vl_resolve_scale_fillOpacity() vl_resolve_scale_opacity() vl_resolve_scale_radius() vl_resolve_scale_shape() vl_resolve_scale_size() vl_resolve_scale_stroke() vl_resolve_scale_strokeDash() vl_resolve_scale_strokeOpacity() vl_resolve_scale_strokeWidth() vl_resolve_scale_theta() vl_resolve_scale_x() vl_resolve_scale_y()

Resolve axes, legends, or scales for composite charts

Make spec objects

As opposed to other functions that modify / add to a spec, these make a sub-component of a Vega-lite spec

Developed by Alicia Schep, Vega-Lite Developers.
